summary: The Louisiana Purchase was a land purchase made by United States president Thomas Jefferson in 1803. He bought the Louisiana territory from France, which was being led by Napoleon Bonaparte at the time, for $15,000,000 USD.
full_text:
The Territory of Louisiana or Louisiana Territory was an organized incorporated territory of the United States that existed from July 4, 1805, until June 4, 1812, when it was renamed the Missouri Territory.
It was formed out of part of the lands acquired by the United States in the Louisiana Purchase, in which colonial Louisiana was purchased from France.
title: Louisiana Territory
